snippet: Jose Calderon had 18 points, 14 assists and 10 rebounds Sunday to lead the host Toronto Raptors to a 103-96 victory over Jeremy Lin and the Houston Rockets.
abstract: NBA Roundup:Toronto Raptors beat Houston Rockets, 103-96; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Jose Calderon had 18 points, 14 assists and 10 rebounds Sunday to lead the host Toronto Raptors to a 103-96 victory over Jeremy Lin and the Houston Rockets.

headline.main: Lin Is Stymied by Calderon and Raptors
headline.print_headline: Lin Is Stymied By Calderon And Raptors
